thanks. that was a typo I have for this post.

Anyhow, I fingered a way to get around it.
If I use 
>java junit.textui.TestRunner com.test.testapp

the juinit test will run fine; but I can't just use
>java com.test.testapp

I have my junit in my classpath; I don't understand why my testapp 
won't know how to find the TestRunner.  Any idea ?

Also
I have some jar file in the ...\webapps\WEB-INF\lib directory.  My 
junit testapp does not seem to know where those files are.  What can 
I do to slove this problem ?

thanks
